definitions.definition: an act or course of action to which a person is morally or legally bound; a duty or commitment.
examples: he has enough cash to meet his present obligations
synonyms: debt; literarytrust "no obligation may be placed upon you without your consent"compulsion
constraint "he felt an obligation to tip well"

definitions.definition: the condition of being morally or legally bound to do something.
examples: they are under no obligation to stick to the scheme

definitions.definition: a debt of gratitude for a service or favor.
examples: she didn't want to be under an obligation to him

definitions.definition: a binding agreement committing a person to a payment or other action.
